Class QuizImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.models.QuizImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Quiz

    public class QuizImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Quiz, java.io.Serializable
    A class for a quiz. A quiz has a unique ID and a list of questions.
    Author:
    Michael Bragg
